### 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(maps)
# Charger les données d'un pays
carte_france <- map_data("world", region = "France")
# Créer la carte
ggplot(data = carte_france, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group)) + 
  geom_polygon(fill = "white", color = "black") +
   coord_quickmap(xlim = c(-10, 10), ylim = c(41, 52)) + 
  theme_void()
```

### Gross Domestic Product (1990-2017)
```{r}
coube1  <-readr::read_csv("./chapter11data.csv")

```

```{r}
#   produire un graphique linéaire
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
ggplot(data = coube1, aes(x = year, y = gdp)) +
  geom_line(color = "#55bd34", size = 1) +
  xlab("Years") +
  ylab("Gross domestic product")  +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(direction = -1)+
  geom_point( color = "#55bd34",size = 2.5)

```
